// src/components/work/data/guides.js
export const guides = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Kamal Perera",
    image: "guide1.jpg",
    location: "Colombo",
    languages: ["English", "Sinhala", "Tamil"],
    rating: 4.9,
    price: 45,
    reviews: 127,
    specialties: ["City Tours", "Food Tours", "Historical Sites"],
    verified: true,
    experience: "8 years",
    responseTime: "2 hours",
    badge: "Top Rated",
    description: "Professional guide with 8+ years experience showing tourists the best of Colombo. Specialized in food tours and historical sites.",
    available: true
  },
  // Add more guides as needed...
];
